metadata.title: CVE-2020-14295 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A SQL injection issue in color.php in Cacti 1.2.12 allows an admin to inject SQL via the filter parameter. This can lead to remote command execution because the product accepts stacked queries.

criterions.comment: cacti package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
